home.title: Dementia Detection System
home.subtitle: AI-powered analysis ke saath comprehensive cognitive assessment platform

accessibility.title: Sabke liye
accessibility.description: Blind, weak vision, non-educated aur educated users ke liye accessible interfaces

comprehensive.title: Comprehensive Tests
comprehensive.description: Aapki needs ke according cognitive, speech, aur behavioral assessments

progress.title: Progress Track karo
progress.description: Detailed reports aur visualizations ke saath time ke saath cognitive health monitor karo

cta.title: Shuru karne ke liye ready ho?
cta.description: Apna account banao aur aaj hi apni cognitive health journey start karo

dashboard.no_tests: Abhi tak koi test complete nahi hua
dashboard.schedule_first_test: Apna pehla cognitive assessment schedule karo

mmse.name: Mini-Mental State Examination
mmse.description: Orientation, memory aur attention including cognitive function ka assessment

orientation_time.name: Time ki orientation
orientation_time.instruction: Please time ke bare mein ye questions ka answer do

orientation_place.name: Place ki orientation
orientation_place.instruction: Please apne location ke bare mein ye questions ka answer do

registration.name: Registration
registration.instruction: Main teen objects ke naam bolunga. Please unhe repeat karo.
registration.repeat_instruction: Ab teen words ko repeat karo:

attention.name: Attention aur calculation
attention.instruction: Please 100 se 7 minus karte hue count karo. 5 numbers ke baad ruk jao.
attention.calculation_prompt: 100 se 7 minus karte hue count karo. Har number enter karo:

avlt.name: Auditory Verbal Learning Test
avlt.description: Word lists ke learning aur recall se related memory test

trial_1.name: Trial 1 - Pehli presentation
trial_1.instruction: Main 15 words ki list padhunga. Dhyan se suno aur phir sare words bolo jo yaad hain.

digit_span.name: Digit Span Test
digit_span.description: Working memory aur attention span ka test

forward.name: Digits forward
forward.instruction: Main kuch numbers bolunga. Unhe same order mein repeat karo.

backward.name: Digits backward
backward.instruction: Main kuch numbers bolunga. Unhe reverse order mein repeat karo.

fluency_animals.name: Animals naming task
fluency_animals.instruction: 60 seconds mein jitne animals ke naam soch sakto ho, bolo. Clear bol ke different animals ke naam bolo.
fluency_animals.prompt: Ab animals ke naam bolna start karo...

description_picture.name: Picture description
description_picture.instruction: Is picture ko dekho aur jo bhi dikhta hai describe karo. Bolo kya ho raha hai, picture mein kaun hai, aur jo details dikhte hain.
description_picture.prompt: Picture mein jo dikhta hai describe karo...

conversation_daily.name: Daily routine description
conversation_daily.instruction: Apne typical day ke bare mein bolo - morning se evening tak. Apni routine, activities aur jo share karna chahte ho describe karo.
conversation_daily.prompt: Apne normal day ke bare mein bolo...

speech_tests.record_instruction: Recording start karne ke liye microphone par click karo

voice_response_monitoring.name: Voice response time monitoring
voice_response_monitoring.description: Audio commands ke liye response time measure karne wala test
voice_response_monitoring.instruction: Audio commands dhyan se suno aur jaldi se respond karo.

audio_pattern_recognition.name: Audio pattern recognition
audio_pattern_recognition.description: Different audio patterns identify aur respond karo
audio_pattern_recognition.instruction: Audio patterns suno aur sequences identify karo.

visual_response_monitoring.name: Visual response time monitoring
visual_response_monitoring.description: Visual stimuli ke liye response time measure karne wala test
visual_response_monitoring.instruction: Screen dhyan se dekho aur visual cues par jaldi respond karo.

game_engagement.name: Game engagement tracking
game_engagement.description: Cognitive engagement assess karne ke liye interactive games
game_engagement.instruction: Interactive games khelo aur jitne ho sake complete karo.

complex_interaction_monitoring.name: Complex interaction monitoring
complex_interaction_monitoring.description: Complex cognitive processing chahiye wale advanced tasks
complex_interaction_monitoring.instruction: Ye complex tasks complete karo jinhe attention aur problem-solving chahiye.
